Body:
data = {'node1': {'a': 0, 'b': 1, 'c': 2, 'd': 3, 'e': 4}, 'node2': {'a': 5,
    'b': 6, 'c': 7, 'd': 8, 'e': 9}}
expected_final_features = pd.DataFrame.from_dict(data, orient='index')
self.rfe._final_features = {(0): expected_final_features[['a', 'b']].
    to_dict(), (1): expected_final_features[['c', 'd']].to_dict(), (2):
    expected_final_features['e'].to_frame().to_dict()}
final_features = self.rfe._finalize_features()
pd.testing.assert_frame_equal(final_features.sort_index(axis=1),
    expected_final_features.sort_index(axis=1))
